entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MemoryMappedViewAccessor: Dispose flushes on temporary files #59606
  • Enumerable.Select/Where should guarantee the order of results #59599
  • Use pipeline caching feature of AzDo in CI #59598
  • Eliminate allocations when enumerating empty collections #59596
  • Different struct layout with object and nint fields #59593
    7.0.0
  • Add support for Zstandard to System.IO.Compression #59591

Closed

  • Using delegate*<void*, uint> instead of a managed delegate in Win32 CreateThread crashes the runtime. #59605
  • Tasks issues on Mac Catalyst #52460
    7.0.0
  • Kerberos authentication not work on .NET 6 RC1 with official docker images #59518
    6.0.0
  • The asp.net core program is deployed on a win7 computer, and an error “The type initializer for 'System.DateTime' threw an exception” is reported when running #59594
  • object initializer for struct does unnecessary processing. #59515

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1386598 #59609
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove invalid test exclusions. #59608
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Prevent cache from being resized #59607
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Guarded Devirt: multiple type checks #59604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Improve Makefile's dotnet.js dependencies #59603
    area-Build-mono
  • Optimize indirection cell call sequences more generally #59602
    * NO MERGE *, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1386324 #59601
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update ConfigurationManager #59600
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Backport from `release/6.0-rc2`: MonoAOTCompiler: detect when nothing has changed, a… #59597
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing pinvoke fixes #59595
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1385667 #59592
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • JIT: Convert Interlocked intrinsics to NamedIntrinsics #55170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tests] Fix PlatformDetection.IsMonoInterpreter for mobile #59587
    area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • [wasm] Build improvements based on feedback #59391
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc2][wasm] Fixes, and improvements based on user feedback #59486
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [draft][wasm] introduce typescript modules #59392
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Eliminate some type comparisons in gshared methods. #59543
    * NO MERGE *, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Support fast tailcalls in R2R #56669
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove redundant checks #59310
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Improve SortedSet DeepCopy performance #56561
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Remove _validator field from ObjectCollection #59589
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Add InstallLocation component to host #59537
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder/Loader area #59590
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [mono] Disable partial generic sharing for gparams with non-enum constraints. #59437
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm
  • FreeBSD12 version cleanup and process and thread enhancements #59339
    os-freebsd, community-contribution
  • FileSystem.Unix: Directory.Delete: remove per item syscall. #59520
    area-System.IO
  • CI matrix change: add Windows.Server.Core.20H2 #59572
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add checking SpeechRecognitionEngine Culture to GrammarBuilder test #59516
    area-System.Speech, community-contribution
  • Change loop cloning condition blocks flow graph #59233
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect tracking of sign bit #59525
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add superpmi.exe option to break to the debugger on exception. #59234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Pipeline to run Exploratory fuzzing tool to catch codegen issues #59489
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
